Name: DWTN Toronto - Fort York/Lakeshore-Studio
Description: This fully furnished studio is located in Fort York/Lakeshore. Located at the corner of Bathurst and Fleet, public transit located right in front, 5-minute walk to King West, 10-minute walk to Rogers Centre and CN Tower. Nestled between the historic Fort York garrison and Lake Ontario, the beautiful Waterpark City condominiums are perfect for anyone visiting or commuting to our lovely Toronto city. The building is within walking distance of many downtown Toronto sites including Exhibition Place, Waterfront Coronation Park, Inukshuk Park, the newly revitalized and energized Queens Quay, BMO Field and  walking distance from CN Tower, Rogers Centre and Air Canada Centre. The apartment is a cozy studio condo located across from Billy Bishop Airport. The guests have full access to the condo and common elements of the condominium building including its exquisite gymnasium facilities, which  an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna and rooftop garden. The guests will have full access to essentials incl
Neighborhood Overview: Closest intersection is Bathurst and Lakeshore. Steps to Lake Ontario, parks and vibrant restaurants, shops and nightlife of King St. and Queen St. West, Exhibition Place, Ontario Place, BMO field and the downtown Billy Bishop (Island) Airport.

Name: PRIVATE SUITE: Ensuite Bath./Garden Patio/Parking
Description: ¥ Your private suite & ensuite bathroom are on the ground floor steps from the front entrance. No need to walk through the rest of the house. ¥ Totally separate from my living quarters two floors above.  ¥ Step outside to your private garden patio.  ¥ Equipped with toaster-oven, fridge, kettle, dishes, tea, etc.  ¥ Stellar location. ¥ Driveway parking in front of house @ $25/day (optional). Reserve in advance. ¥ Business Travel Ready. SuperHost certified. Over 200 exemplary reviews. ¥ Quiet, bright, cheerful suite on secluded ground floor so you needn't walk through the rest of the house. ¥ Ensuite private bathroom. ¥ Walk-out to your private patio garden. ¥ Luxurious queen bed and a comfortable inflatable twin bed if required. ¥ Mini-fridge, toaster-oven, kettle, coffee maker, dishes, tea, radio, soap, shampoo, conditioner, skin moisturizer, towels. ¥ Parking in driveway @ $25 per day. Reserve when booking. -------------------------------------------------------- ¥ wifi ¥ washer & dry
Neighborhood Overview: ¥ The house is located in the city core on a coveted & quaint residential street in the middle of a vibrant & entertaining neighbourhood. ¥ 2 minute walk to funky Queen Street & King Street provide many cafe, restaurant, shopping, art gallery & public transportation choices.  ¥ The house is very central so you're a 15 walk to most destinations - Lakefront, Convention Centre, Rogers Centre, Eaton Centre, Art Gallery of Ontario, etc.

Name: Large room, in trendy Bloordale!
Description: Large room with double bed, memory foam mattress, and hardwood flooring. 2nd floor in a typical Toronto house, built around 1910. Bloordale is a trendy neighborhood with many shops, bars, and restaurants. 7 minute walk to subway station, 4 minute walk to UP express airport train. A parking lot is about a 10 minute walk. Shared kitchen and bathroom. There are 3 other rooms in this 2-floor apartment. 7 minute walk to Lansdowne or Dundas West subway station. Toronto traffic can be very bad, so the subway is great for getting around. Buses and streetcars connect from the subway network. From Pearson International Airport, for $5.65 you can take the express train (Union Pearson Express), which takes about 26 minutes. For $3.25 you can take the TTC express bus to Kipling station, and then to Dundas West station on the same subway line, about 50 minutes. Street permit parking is also available, if required. 1. There are 3 other rooms in this place, so if you don't like having roommates, this

Name: Lux. Master room + Pvt Bath in Downtown Toronto
Description: Very spacious Master Bedroom in a fully furnished 1,100SQF apartment.  Private Bathroom with shower AND bathtub. The bedroom comes equipped with a Queen Bed, a desk and chair, and a TV (with Chromecast) Fully furnished, spacious, bright apartment. Excellent downtown location on top of college station Within 0 - 200 Meters (2 Starbucks, Metro, 7/11, Shoppers, Loblaws, Sobey's, Bulk Barn, Winners, TTC + lots of restaurants, and shops) You will be sharing the apartment with my two roommates A beautiful master bedroom in a massive 1100 sq ft apartment in the center of downtown. You'll have your own private bathroom complete with a shower and a jacuzzi/tub.  The living room is fully furnished with leather couches, a gorgeous island, and a fully stocked kitchen. You have full access to the rooftop between the hours of 7:00am - 11:45pm. I will be travelling, but will have full access to my phone via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN).  For emergencies, my roommates will be able to assist. Almost eve
Neighborhood Overview: Almost everything is within walking distance!  Dundas square/Eaton centre: 5 mins Yorkville: 15 mins King St. W: 20 mins There's tons of food options around the condo, and a bunch of bars (I recommend checking out Pogue Mahone). The condo is literally above College Station so getting around will be a piece of cake!

Name: Spacious Penthouse Downtown Toronto
Description: We are renting our spacious, spacious two floor penthouse suite (approx 1500 sqft) available right in the heart of downtown Toronto. This luxurious apartment is ideally located within walking distance to many attractions such as the Eaton Centre and Ryerson University.  There is a large living space, dining area for 6, two full bathrooms, with two bedrooms upstairs and a pullout queen futon on the main floor for extra guests. This is a fun space with lots of colour, style and character!  The living area is huge by Toronto standards and has lots of space for everyone to interact/ relax comfortably.  The living area also includes a pull out queen sized futon.  There is a full kitchen and separate dining area which is open to the main space.  There is one full washroom on the main floor near the entrance. The second floor has two bedrooms, both equipped with small dresser, bedside tables and a real queen sized bed.  There is also another full washroom on this floor. **Note** Some of the f
Neighborhood Overview: Our apartment is in the heart of downtown Toronto and walking distance to the Gay Village, Yorkville, Yonge & Dundas Square, The Eaton's Centre, Saint Lawrence Market, Ryerson University, George Brown, etc. This is a great area which is close to everything.  There is always something fun going on!

Name: Hello Yorkville, Welcome Shopping
Description: My place is close to Royal Ontario Museum, The Bata Shoe Museum, The Keg Steakhouse & Bar - Mansion, Smith, Gardiner Museum, Dundas Square, Eaton Centre, . YouÕll love my place because of the ambiance, the light, and the neighborhood. My place is good for solo adventurers.  This is shared accommodation with a separate room. The washroom is shared.   I do have a cat that stays with me. She is very friendly, and does not bother you. I can as visible as you would like to provide tips of places to go within the city. I can also be like Houdini and disappear. Reappear only when needed. I want to make your stay comfortable Accessibility accessibility accessibility! You don't need a car!  2 mins walk to Yonge Street  2 mins walk to Church Street  5 mins walk to Yonge /Bloor subway line  5 mins walk to Yonge /Wellesley subway  11 mins walk to Yorkville's finest restaurants and designer fashion stores 20 mins walk to Dundas Square (Times Square of Toronto) and Eatons Centre

Name: New 2bdrm in Yorkville (best part of Toronto)
Description: In the heart of Toronto: minutes walk from Toronto's little Europe (Yorkville) and Yonge and Bloor (Toronto's main) station. You'll find some of Toronto's best bars, restaurants and coffee shops in the vicinity. Unit is spacious, gets a lot of light and was recently remodeled with brand new furniture. Kindly, treat it like your own ;)

Name: Luxurious Condo w/ Parking, Pool, 3 Beds & Views
Description: My place is close to CN Tower,Metro Convention Centre,Rogers Centre, Union Station & ACC. It is on the 18th floor & has amazing views of the CN Tower. FREE PARKING! My place is good for couples,solo adventurers, business travellers,& families (with kids). There is a king bed in the Master bedroom, a double bed in the second (very small) bedroom & a queen sofa bed. I HAVE 2 SEASONS TICKETS TO ALL RAPTOR GAMES THIS YEAR SECTION 105 ROW 26 SEATS 20&21, INQUIRE FOR PRICING AND AVAILABILITY! This 700 sq foot unit is in one of the best buildings in the city.  It is like a 5 Star Hotel! You will not be disappointed. This unit will be professionally cleaned between each guest and it will be my personal mission to ensure you have the best stay possible in one of the greatest cities in the world! You will have access to the rooftop pool, the gym, hot tub, spinning studio and yoga studio.  You will have your own personal parking spot. I am always available for my guests This condo is super close
